### Internship Trainee — Vivasoft Limited
**October – November 2022 | Dhaka**

- Completed a 2-week internship as part of the Industrial Attachment course.
- Led a front-end development team of 3, coordinating integration efforts and ensuring project delivery.
- Developed a web application, [**Med-Api**](https://github.com/nabin47/med-api), to provide comprehensive medicinal information, demonstrating proficiency in web technologies and collaborative development.
